identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a top 1% dark-mode CRM that feels professional, dense, and technically precise, avoiding generic SaaS aesthetics.

heading.usage: Headings (h1-h3), Big Numbers, KPIs. Use font-weight 500 or 600. Avoid bold (700) unless necessary.

body.usage: Body text, tables, inputs, labels. Excellent legibility at small sizes.

mono.usage: IDs, Order Numbers, Code snippets, tabular data requiring alignment.

rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + text-xs + tracking-widest (0.1em).
Line height: leading-none for headings, leading-relaxed for body.
Never use pure white (#FFFFFF) for text. Use slate-50 (#f8fafc) or slate-200 (#e2e8f0).

surface_styles.card: bg-slate-900/50 border border-slate-800 rounded-xl shadow-sm backdrop-blur-sm
surface_styles.header: bg-slate-950/80 border-b border-slate-800 backdrop-blur-md sticky top-0 z-50

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(59,130,246,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md transition-colors

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 transition-all focus:border-primary/50

cards.kpi: relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-slate-800 bg-slate-900/50 p-6 hover:border-slate-700 transition-colors group

effects.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

login_background.usage: Full screen background for login page with overlay

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px for elegance, 2px for active states.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text.
DO NOT use pure black (#000000) backgrounds; use #020617 or #0f172a.
Use 'recharts' for charts with custom tooltips.
Ensure all forms have validation feedback.
Use 'Grid Borders' style for the dashboard: visible 1px borders between grid items instead of gaps where possible, or tight gaps with borders.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install lucide-react recharts sonner clsx tailwind-merge`
2. Update `tailwind.config.js` with the colors provided in this JSON.
3. Update `index.css` to import the fonts (Outfit, Public Sans, JetBrains Mono).
4. Create a `Layout` component that implements the Sidebar + Header + Main Content structure.
5. Use the 'Control Room Grid' strategy for the Dashboard page.
6. Ensure the Login page uses the provided background image with a dark overlay for text readability.
